title: Question:
author: Loco1887
content: Which one will recover the fastest in 2022? What do you think?

comments.author: JeffBrad12
comments.body: Only voting for ape token. The metaverse has not yet launched. The hype from the launch of ape metaverse can easily make it to recover as fast as possible compared with its competitors. I think that you know about the story if ape token was instantly leading the metaverse market, right? This may possible for this token to recovering the price as soon as possible. You shall see how AXS can recover the price so fast. Any top metaverse with billion marketcap can easily recover its price from the bottom. MANA is also potentially to do the same like ape.

comments.author: chichigirl
comments.body: I think it is Apecoin. Sorry for MANA and SAND fans. For me while most of gamers will treat their NFT games as part time jobs where every time they got their coins they dump to finance their needs, these nft game coins will continue to dump just like SLP tokens.
